title: Navigate to menubar in reading mode
Activate menubar in reading mode
instructions: Navigate to the 'Font" menu item in the 'Text Formatting' menubar example with down arrow. | Activate the 'Font' menu

title: Navigate to menubar with commands that switch mode from reading to interaction
Navigate to menu item in menubar in reading mode
instructions: Navigate to 'Text Formatting' menu with down arrow| Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu

title: Navigate to open menu item in menubar in interaction mode
instructions: Open 'Font' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu

title: Close submenu in interaction mode
instructions: Open 'Text Align' submenu. | Close the menu

title: Navigate to checked menu item radio in interaction mode
instructions: Open "Font" menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Sans-serif' menu item radio

title: Navigate to unchecked menu item radio in interaction mode
instructions: Open "Font" menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Monospace' menu item radio

title: Navigate to unchecked menu item checkbox in interaction mode
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox

title: Navigate to checked menu item checkbox in interaction mode
instructions:
Open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | 
Navigate to 'Italic' menu item and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.) | 
Re-open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | 
Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox

title: Read menu item in reading mode
instructions: Navigate to the 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to the size menu item in the menubar. | Read 'Size' menu item

title: Read unchecked menu item radio in reading mode
instructions: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item radio with down arrow. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the  'Blue' menu item radio

title: Read checked menu item radio in reading mode
instructions: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Black' menu item radio with down arrow. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the  'Black' menu item radio

title: Read unchecked menu item checkbox in reading mode
instructions: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox with down arrow. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the 'Italic' menu item checkbox

title: Read checked menu item checkbox in reading mode
instructions: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.) | Re-open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the 'Italic' menu item checkbox

title: Read disabled menu item in reading mode
instructions: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Size' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Size' menu with  down arrow. | Navigate to 'X-Small' with down arrow. | Activate 'X-Small'. with Enter. | Open 'Size' menu with down arrow. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the 'Smaller' menu item
